meanings.definition: A tropical climbing plant with fragrant white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The stephanotis climbed up the trellis in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I picked a beautiful stephanotis from the vine.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to steal the stephanotis for its own bouquet.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet and pure as a blooming stephanotis.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the stephanotis filled the air with joy.

meanings.definition: The fragrant white flower of the stephanotis plant.
meanings.sent1: She wore a lovely stephanotis in her hair for the wedding.
meanings.sent2: The stephanotis blossom perfumed the room with its delicate scent.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat batted at the stephanotis, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the gentle petals of a stephanotis floating in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the stephanotis flower captivated all who saw it.
